metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5611 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component before 5.0.28 and 5.1.x before 5.1.8 in Oracle Virtualization allows local users to affect confidentiality via vectors related to Core.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
